title: CBIC Notifies New GST Rate Changes Effective October 2025
excerpt: The Central Board of Indirect Taxes and Customs (CBIC) has issued a notification revising GST rates on select goods and services, effective from October 15, 2025. Businesses should review the changes to ensure compliance with updated input tax credit provisions.

title: High Court Ruling on Service Tax Credit in Transitional Period
excerpt: The Calcutta High Court reaffirmed the admissibility of certain transitional credits under legacy service tax cases, highlighting the need for proper documentation during GST migration.

title: Customs Update: New Valuation Guidelines for Imports
excerpt: New CBIC guidelines aim to standardize customs valuation practices, minimizing disputes and enhancing trade transparency.
